Properties.Description:
You have unlocked access to the Perk Recombobulator.

Visit the Armory tab to replace a Perk on a schematic of your choice.

To replace a Perk:
Select Armory
Select Schematics
Select a Schematic
Select Upgrade/Inspect
Select Upgrade
Select Modify Perks
Select a Perk to Modify
Select a Perk under Replacements
